query: Where are all CVN (Charpy V-notch) toughness testing requirements consolidated in AWS D1.1:2025?
expected_answer: Table 6.7 — all CVN requirements and essential variable impacts
rationale: D1.1:2025 consolidates all CVN testing requirements (previously scattered across Clause 6) into Table 6.7. This table now governs when CVN testing is required as a supplementary essential variable for WPS/PQR qualification, improving clarity for CWI instruction and contractor compliance.

citations.excerpt: CVN toughness testing requirements — supplementary essential variables
